### Setup 
```{r}
install.packages(c("ggplot2", "gcookbook"))
library(ggplot2)
library(gcookbook)
```
Let's make sure the we see a data set from gcookbook
```{r}
str(pg_mean)
```

## Chapter 3
### 3.1 Basic Bar Graph
```{r}
ggplot(pg_mean, aes(group, weight)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity", fill="lightblue", colour="black)
```
